text: Eugene Scape Littles (June 29, 1943 â€“ September 9, 2021) was an American basketball player and coach. He was born in Washington, D.C.. He coached the Charlotte Hornets between 1990 until 1991 and for the Denver Nuggets from 1994 until 1995. Littles died on September 9, 2021 at the age of 78.Ex-Hornets coach, ABA player Gene Littles dies at 78 ==References== Category:1943 births Category:2021 deaths Category:National Basketball Association coaches Category:Sportspeople from Washington, D.C.
